definition[0]: a short journey in order to do something for someone, for example delivering or collecting something for them
example[0]: I seemed to spend my life running errands for people.
example[1]: She was always sending me on errands.
example[2]: He quickly set out on his errand of mercy  (=journey to help someone in danger).
example[3]: I couldnâ€™t stop because I was on an errand.
